content:
It's great that you have two bikes to choose from, and it's understandable that you've been using your road bike more frequently while your mountain bike is in the repair shop.

It's always a bummer when one of our bikes is out of commission, but it's great that you're making the most of the situation by getting more miles on your road bike. Have you noticed any differences in your riding style or preferences since switching to the road bike?

Road biking can be a great way to improve your endurance and speed, and it's awesome that you're getting more comfortable on the road. Are you finding that you're enjoying the road bike more than you expected, or are you looking forward to getting your mountain bike back and hitting the trails again?

Also, what's the story with your mountain bike being in the repair shop? Was it a routine maintenance issue or did something unexpected happen during a ride?
